title: The PM Interview Book
description:
Why This Ebook is a Must-Have: 
✅ 70+ real PM interview questions 🧩 
✅ Proven frameworks to structure answers 📚 
✅ Covers behavioral, technical, & strategy questions 🛠️ 
✅ Actionable tips for every interview stage 💡 
✅ Bonus templates & course 🎁

Your all-in-one guide to acing product management interviews and landing your dream role.
